attributes.description:
Immaculate Condition with full service history with Agents. This economical vehicle has bluetooth, and it is safe and has plenty more to offer. If you are looking for a hatch with all the that's incredibly reliable, mechanically sound and hassle free then look no further... this well kept Audi is perfect for you.
Competitively priced, mechanically and cosmetically sound - the ideal combo. Get down to our showroom today to view and test drive!
We offer 2-year Prestige unlimited kilometer extended warranties separately. Finance is available at all major banks. Trade-ins welcome. Price does not include On The Road fees. Buy with confidence at a Blue Chip Dealer @  www.DrivingForce.biz 
We'll BUY your CAR, regardless whether you purchase a vehicle from our Dealership!
Contact:   Ryan 060 928 1016   Geno 072 550 8856  o/h   021 203 8888
Driving Force
21 Montague Drive
Montague Gardens 
021 203 8888
www.drivingforce.biz
Proudly a member of the Blue Chip Group! Buy with Confidence

attributes.description:
Great condition! Perfect family 7 seater,diesel,automatic,4-wheel-drive SUV. Comfortable, reliable and capable.
Packed with factory extra's such as; double sunroof, push-to-start, leather seats, towbar, parking sensors, 7 seater, USB/Aux Radio, Multifunctional steeringwheel, reverse camera, aircon, electic windows, electric mirrors, etc.
Book your test drive today!
2yr Prestige unlimited kilometer extended warranties and Finance available at all major banks.
Trade-ins welcome.
Nationwide delivery service available on request.
Contact:

Ashwin - 067 133 3217

attributes.description:
Finance Is Available With All The Major Banks As We Are Approved Dealers. Please Come And Visit Our Used Car Manager And Our Business Manager
They Will Be Able To Arrange A Taylor Made Deal Structure To Match Your Pocket. Trade-ins Welcome And We Pay Top Prices For Good Clean Vehicles. First Time To Finance
Our Finance And Insurance Manager Will Assist You Step By Step Throughout Your Process. There Are Great Warranty Options Available For This Vehicle And Other Great Products. Should You Require Further Information Or You Would Like To Arrange A Test Drive Please Do Not Hesitate To Contact Us At Motus Toyota Kempton Park
